translation.en: I don't have time to worry about how it happened.
We're genetically engineered to stop aging at 25.
The trouble is, we live only one more year
unless we can get more time.
We earn it and spend it.
I just want to wake up with more time on my hand than hours in the day.
translation.ko: 난 그저 시간 걱정 없이 살고 싶을 뿐이다

translation.en: You got in late last night. I put in some overtime.
They drink it in New Greenwich. Happy 50th!
Oh, I was sure I'd have a grandchild by now. Here we go.
Bela's daughter is always asking about you.
Who has time for a girlfriend? Besides, what's the hurry?
We owe half that in rent. Eight for the electric and we're still late on that loan.
translation.ko: 집세, 전기세 내야 하고 대출금도 밀렸어

translation.en: I can make extra on the side, you know.
Remember, I'm not here tonight. I got two days' work in the garment district.
translation.ko: 일 때문에 이틀간 집 비울 거야

translation.en: I know. Meet me at the bus stop tomorrow.
After I pay off the loan, I won't have long. I'll be there.
I just wouldn't know what to do if I lost you.
Let me give you 30 minutes so you can have a decent lunch.
When you get back, we're going to celebrate.
What are you talking about, Mya? You have a whole year.
Not a year I can use yet.
Come on, Will. I've got bills to pay.
Four minutes for a cup of coffee?
You want coffee or you want to reminisce?
How many shifts you got today, Borel? Just the two.
translation.ko: - 오늘 일 많아? - 두 탕 뛰어

translation.en: If you had any of your father in you, we could make a fortune.
translation.ko: 네가 아버지 닮았으면 시간 재벌 될 텐데

translation.en: Whoa, what is this? Where's the rest?
Never met the quota. My units are up from last week.
translation.ko: - 할당량을 못 채웠어 - 내 생산량은 늘었어요

translation.en: So's the quota. Next. That's a joke, right?
Next. MAN: Move it. You're taking forever.
I don't have time to gamble anymore.
Because ever since you stopped playing, I started winning.
You still owe me an hour.

translation.ko: 와이프가 찾더라 저 사람 계속 술 돌리는데

translation.en: This madman's been buying drinks all night. He's got a century!
translation.ko: 저 사람 계속 술 돌리는데 100년이나 가졌어

translation.en: Come on, let me get you home.
Soon as I finish this drink.
Do you want to come home with me?
You can take us both home.
You need to get out of here.
I mean, they aren't going to rob you. They are going to kill you.
They can't take that much time and let you live to tell about it.
I don't think you understand. You should not be here!
translation.ko: 이해 안 돼요? 여기 있으면 위험해요

translation.en: He's asking for it. Let's go. He's not one of us.
Don't worry. I won't do anything stupid.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 바보짓 안 할 테니
걱정하지 마 바보짓 안 할 테니 먼저 가

translation.en: And that, sir, is a very nice watch.
Do you mind if I try it on? I think it would suit me.
translation.ko: 내가 차봐도 될까? 잘 어울릴 거 같은데

translation.en: I'm an old man. Turned 75 last week.
translation.ko: 나 나이 많아 저번 주에 75살 됐거든

translation.en: Let's get you out of here.
Stop. What are you doing? I can take care of myself.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 안 도와줘도 돼

translation.en: I know what I'm doing. Run. Run!
Where the hell are you going? Get in here!
What the hell are you doing here?
I'll get you out of here.
Looks like you could use some help yourself.
You won't see 106, you have too many more nights like tonight.
But the day comes when you've had enough.
Your mind can be spent, even if your body's not.
That's your problem? You've been alive too long?
You ever known anyone who's died?
For a few to be immortal, many must die.
translation.ko: 소수의 영생을 위해선 대다수가 죽어야 하지

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
You really don't know, do you?
Everyone can't live forever. Where would we put them?
Why do you think there are Time Zones?
Why do you think taxes and prices go up the same day in the ghetto?
translation.ko: 왜 빈민가의 물가가 같은 날 폭등하겠어?

translation.en: The cost of living keeps rising to make sure people keep dying.
How else could there be men with a million years while most live day to day?
translation.ko: 남의 시간을 뺏어야만 내가 영원히 사는 거야

translation.en: No one has to die before their time.
If you had as much time as I have on that clock,
translation.ko: 만약 자네 시계에 나처럼 시간이 많다면

translation.en: what would you do with it?
I can tell you one thing.
If I had all that time,
I sure as hell wouldn't waste it.
Don't worry. I won't take it in the night.
A shame we gotta wait 25 years.
We could use that year right now.
You'd better get her inside, Greta.
They were going to kill him.
He timed himself out before I could stop him.
He didn't just give me this. He gave me the truth about it.
translation.ko: 시간만 준 게 아니야 시스템의 진실도 알려줬어

translation.en: You can't let anyone see that.
You know that time will get you killed.
How long have we been friends?
Where this won't look out of place.
I finally got the time to take my mom to New Greenwich.
COMPUTER VOICE: Loan payment received, two days. Thank you.
Now it's two. Price went up.
My son is meeting me. He'll pay the difference.
translation.ko: 아들 만나는데 나머진 걔가 낼 거예요

translation.en: I have an hour and a half.
The last time anyone saw him alive, there was over a century on that clock.
Around here, they'd kill you for a week.
What was he doing in this Time Zone?
was he might have brought this on himself.
Interesting. How long you been keeping time, Jaeger?
Let me know what you think when you have been doing it for 50.
It doesn't matter why he came here. What matters are the hundred years that came with him.
translation.ko: 여기 온 이유는 상관없어 사라진 100년이 중요하지

translation.en: Trust me, no one saw anything.
What would you like us to do, sir?
What we always do. Follow the time.
Hey, Ray. I'll give you 10 minutes for an hour.
When are you gonna get out of the game, Leila? You gotta be pushing 60.
Am I in the right place?
We don't normally make pickups in this Zone.
COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one month.
There are more of these than I remember.
What are you really doing here?
I'm going to take them for everything they've got.
translation.ko: 그들이 가져간 걸 모조리 되찾을 거요

translation.en: I'm going to make them pay.
Please, miss. You can't be too careful.
Two months for a standard room.
Do you need help with your bags?
He's fast. He's going to have to be.
The camera doesn't show us how the body got into the river.
(SIGHS) What do we know? We know that most thefts in Dayton amount to hours or days.
translation.ko: 강도사건 대부분은 끽해야 몇 시간, 하루인데

translation.en: I don't see any more in circulation.
He could have capsuled the time.
You can't hide a hundred years in the ghetto.
They can sense when a man has a month more than he should.
That'll be eight and a half weeks.
You're not from around here, are you?
You do everything a little too fast.
What's that place across the street?
If you turn back the clocks the day of Hamilton's death, and look at the time checks,
someone spent years crossing four different Time Zones from Dayton--
translation.ko: 누군가 타임 존 네 곳을 지나갔어요

translation.en: To New Greenwich. The cameras picked up on his suspicious behavior.
translation.ko: 뉴 그리니치에 갔어 감시 카메라에 찍혔지

translation.en: He's conscious of the surveillance, he doesn't have a bodyguard, and he runs.
But if he has time, he doesn't need to run.
translation.ko: 시간이 많으니 뛸 필요 없을 텐데요

translation.en: It's a hard habit to break.
I assume my time is as good as anyone's.
Indeed it is. However, there is a voluntary donation
translation.ko: 그건 알지만 비회원은 기부금을 내야 합니다

translation.en: for non-members. Most give a year.
translation.ko: 그건 알지만 비회원은 기부금을 내야 합니다 대부분 1년을 내죠

translation.en: I don't believe we've had the pleasure of your company before, Mr... Salas.
Philippe Weis. You must come from time.
translation.ko: 난 필립 와이스요 명문가 자제신가 보군요

translation.en: You could say I'm gambling my inheritance.
You don't have a guard, Mr. Salas?
I assumed I was amongst friends.
When you've been 25 for 85 years, like I have,
knowing only a random act of violence can take your life,
translation.ko: 작은 실수로도 죽을 수 있단 걸 깨닫고

translation.en: you learn to appreciate what you have.
And you seem to have a lot to appreciate.
Of course, some think what we have is unfair.
But isn't this just the next logical step in our evolution?
And hasn't evolution always been unfair? It's always been survival of the fittest.
And I think your hand is weak.
It appears you're all in, Mr. Salas.
No offense. I knew I was going to win.
translation.ko: 건방진 소리 같지만 이길 걸 알았거든요

translation.en: Is she my mother, my sister or my daughter?
translation.ko: 저 사람이 내 어머니일까? 아니면 여동생, 딸?

translation.en: You're hoping she's not my wife.
Things used to be simpler once. So I'm told.
Though she does look a lot like my wife. Sylvia?
You've taken years off my father's life.
Which is normally what you do. Isn't that right, my darling?
We're having a party tomorrow night.
Perhaps you'll give him a chance to win back some of those years.
translation.ko: 아빠가 잃은 시간을 되찾을 기회 주세요

translation.en: Carl will tell you where I am. Good night, Mr. Salas.
To wherever you're going to display it.
Hell, I'm going to drive it.
Allow me to introduce my mother-in-law, Clara,
my wife, Michele, and my daughter, Sylvia.
I believe you two have already met.
PHILIPPE: I'll come find you later
Do you always have a hired hand standing right next to you?
That doesn't make it very easy to get to know you.
I think that's the idea. Your idea?
You all have a lot to lose.
I haven't quite figured that out yet.
Yes, why bother? What's the hurry?
Right. Why do today what you can do in a century?
I know one thing we can do.
Do you really come from time?
Reminds me of people who come from the ghetto.
Oh, no? The clock is good for no one.
The poor die and the rich don't live.
We can all live forever as long as we don't do anything foolish.
translation.ko: 바보짓만 안 하면 영원히 사는 것

translation.en: Doesn't that scare you? That maybe you'll never do anything foolish?
translation.ko: 무섭지 않아요? 이건 사는 게 아니죠

translation.en: Or courageous or anything worth a damn?
translation.ko: 틀에 박혀서 즐거움은 느낄 수도 없고

translation.en: He's only an hour ahead of us.
I've never seen anything like it.
You have this in your backyard. You never go in.
Well? What are you waiting for?
What happened to doing something foolish?
Have you seen my daughter? I have.
It's all right, everyone. What's this about?
I'm sorry to have to break up the party, Mr. Weis.
I just need a word with your friend.
What are you doing in this Zone?
It's not illegal, is it? To change Time Zones?
A man named Henry Hamilton gave me over a century.
He said he didn't need it anymore.
Henry Hamilton was worth thousands of years.
You expect me to believe that he was immortal and he wanted to die?
translation.ko: 그런 사람이 죽고 싶어서 시간을 거저 줬다?

translation.en: I don't expect you to believe it.
But, hey, if you guys are looking for stolen time,
maybe you should arrest everyone here.
I only concern myself with what I can measure.
And that time is in the wrong hands.
That time will be held, along with you.
We'll leave you two hours for booking and processing.
Why are you investigating a suicide?
There's mass murder in the ghetto every day.
I heard another man talk like that.
You were probably too young to remember your father.
translation.ko: 네 아버지인데 어릴 때라 기억 안 날 거야

translation.en: This is New Greenwich, after all.
Sylvia? Do as I say and go with the guards.
Oh, for God's sake, Father. There's an army in this house.
If we can't stop one man from killing us, we should kill ourselves.
Move! Get out of the way!
Put it down or I'll blow her head off.
You're going to kill us! Please just let me out!
Do you even know how to drive?
I guess you really are from the ghetto, after all.
What the hell do you know about where I'm from? Give me some time.
translation.ko: 뭘 안다고? 빨리 시간 좀 줘

translation.en: Or you're gonna kill me, like you killed Henry Hamilton?
I'm not giving you a second.
I should have listened to my father.
Anybody sees it, you're definitely dead.
Now that worked too well. You guys wasted a gorgeous car.
He'll wake up dead. That'll be a shock.
Too bad. I would have preferred to kill him more beautifully.
The man he stole from me had more than a century.
It's like an angel fell from the sky.
Yeah, we're not alive for long, either.
Where did my time go? I have a half hour!
Minutemen. Does everyone in the ghetto steal?
Please help me, Will. Let me guess, now you like the idea of sharing.
Hey, don't worry. It's not the first time I've been this broke.
translation.ko: 빈털터리 된 거 이번이 처음은 아니니까

translation.en: Well, it's a first for me.
What are we going to do?
Whatever we have to. Come on, we got to go.
Dispatch, wire me my per diem.
Judging by the lack of dead bodies, I have to assume they are also.
translation.ko: 시체가 없는 걸 보니 놈들도 살아 있군

translation.en: They got jacked. They couldn't have left here with more than minutes.
He's back in his old neighborhood.
So, where do you want us to start looking?
We don't. He'll come to us.
He drank himself to death with nine years on his clock.
Will, we have minutes. Try not to act like it.
translation.ko: - 몇 분 안 남았어 - 티 내지 마

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean? Shut up!
We're going to die, Will! Do you want to die?
I hope those are real. Run.
MAN: Come back in an hour.
I'll give you two days for them.
You can take the 48 hours, or you can be a pretty corpse.
I guess I got my wish.
Your name's on a lot of buildings.
How much is he worth, anyway?
What do you think he'd pay to get you back?
You have no shame, do you?
COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one minute.
Mr. Weis, please give the phone to the Timekeeper.
Hello, Will. How much do you want?
You'll never live to spend it.
Then distribute it to the Time Lines in Dayton.
Do it by sunrise tomorrow and she can go home.
translation.ko: 해 뜨기 전까지 그럼 여잘 보내지

translation.en: You keep talking like him, you're going to die like him.
translation.ko: 아버지처럼 굴다간 같은 꼴 날 거야

translation.en: My father died in a fight, trying to take a man's time.
Oh, no. His crime wasn't taking time.
He was doing something far more dangerous.
Please don't make your father's mistake.
A thousand years to the Time Lines.
This is insane. They can take your time, just like that.
We should be safe here until dawn.
I pay by the day. It'll take them a while to find me.
translation.ko: 일일 계산이라 우릴 못 찾아낼 거야

translation.en: There's water. It's cold, but it's something.
You can put on fresh clothes.
He died when I was a boy.
He was a fighter. Strong arm.
He wasn't the strongest, but he knew how to win.
translation.ko: 제일 세진 않았지만 이기는 법을 아셨지

translation.en: What you do is let them have the upper hand.
Then, he'd let his time go all the way down.
that when you were down to your last seconds
and forget to watch their own.
I think he was killed for giving away what he won.
translation.ko: 살해되신 것 같아 딴 시간을 나눠줘서

translation.en: He wasn't just giving them time.
translation.ko: 아버진 단지 시간만 준 게 아니야

translation.en: How long have you been this old?
What was it like when your clock started?
My year was gone in a week, we were so in debt.
After that, I lived day to day.
translation.ko: 이후론 하루 벌어 하루 먹고 살았어

translation.en: That's what you're gonna look like for the rest of your life.
My dad gave me a decade to celebrate.
It's nobody's fault, what they're born with.
Let's see how generous your father is now.
The Timekeepers would have never let him do it.
You don't have to say that.
How do you think my father built all those buildings?
By giving away a thousand years?
There's people on the streets. I can move without being spotted.
translation.ko: 난 사람들 틈에 끼면 발각 안 될 거야

translation.en: How does anyone live like this?
I'll watch from here, I'll make sure you're safe.
You know, you could fight this.
I can say that running to the ghetto was my idea.
My father'd believe that, he thinks I'm reckless.
He has a lot of influence, Will. He can get you a lawyer.
He can make a deal with those Timekeepers.
I'm pretty sure that Timekeeper doesn't make deals.
What are you going to do?
Is it stealing if it's already stolen?
translation.ko: 이미 훔친 걸 가져도 훔치는 건가?

translation.en: COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one minute.
You couldn't spare a second, Father?
I wish I could say I'm surprised.
Did you hear what I just said? You know I'd do anything for you.
Sorry to disappoint you, we don't keep much on us.
translation.ko: 우린 시간을 많이 안 갖고 다녀

translation.en: Think of this as a gift.
I didn't mean to shoot him. I wanted to scare him. I think you did both.
Thank you. What have you got?
Why did you give him time? You should have taken it.
It'll be hours before the others show up.
He could die in the ghetto. He still might.
Stay a while. You might like us if you got to know us!
They're going to think you're with me. Yes.
You've been shot. I was worried you timed out.
What are we going to do?
We can't keep driving around in this car. It's a cop car.
translation.ko: 계속 경찰차 몰고 돌아다닐 순 없잖아

translation.en: The mistake you made was stopping.
Now, let's see who you got back there.
Got to be a year or two nobody's using.
I was just trying to help.
Now, I'd say, "Your money or your life," but since your money is your life...
translation.ko: 우리한테 목숨 같은 시간을 좀 줘야겠네요

translation.en: How dare you steal from me?
Don't think of it as stealing. No?
Think of it as repossession. I'll leave you with what I've had most every day of my life.
translation.ko: 누군가 내게서 뺏어간 걸 되찾아가는 거지

translation.en: You can do a lot in a day.
translation.ko: 하루면 많은 걸 할 수 있죠

translation.en: I owe you these. You shouldn't have.
translation.ko: - 빚 갚는 거야 - 그럴 필요 없는데

translation.en: FEMALE ANCHOR: Will Salas, prime suspect in the murder of Henry Hamilton,
is believed to be traveling with Sylvia Weis,
translation.ko: 살인사건 용의자 윌 살라스가 금융계의 거물 와이스의 딸과 도주했습니다

translation.en: daughter of finance magnate, Philippe Weis.
Citizens are advised to exercise extreme... (TURNS OFF TV)
You've forgotten I shot a cop.
I can say I made you do all of it.
Do I really want to spend my whole life trying not to die by mistake?
A lot of people would say being here is a mistake.
I'm starting to think that I don't, either.
I want to reassure you all there is no cause for alarm. No ransom was paid.
translation.ko: 걱정할 필요 없어요 몸값은 안 줬습니다

translation.en: MAN: Your Zone is at risk, Philippe.
WOMAN: It puts us at risk. It can spread.
Too much time in the wrong hands can crash the market.
This hostage situation will be quickly resolved.
Everything is under control. We'll talk soon.
Timekeeper. After this regrettable incident, it's really not necessary for you to come in person.
translation.ko: 타임키퍼, 여기까지 직접 올 필요 없었는데요

translation.en: I'm afraid it really is necessary.
When can we hope for a rescue?
I believe that's the point. She doesn't appear to want to be rescued.
translation.ko: 따님이 구조되길 원치 않는 것 같던데요

translation.en: Raymond. May I call you Raymond?
I invited the man into my home.
He had so much time, how was I supposed to know?
Of course, Sylvia brought this on herself by her lack of vigilance.
That's why I always tried to keep her close.
But she is clearly under Will Salas' control.
If it's a matter of resources, I'm happy to make a contribution.
It's a scandal, what we pay our Timekeepers.
I've issued a warrant for your daughter's arrest.
If she contacts you and you assist her in any way, I will issue a warrant for your arrest.
translation.ko: 만약 따님을 도우면 회장님도 체포할 거고요

translation.en: There is nothing I cannot buy.
translation.ko: 내가 가진 시간으로 못 살 건 없지

translation.en: how many of my years do you want?
even in your lifetime, Mr. Weis. Good night.
And you don't pull it until you actually want to shoot something.
translation.ko: 진짜 쏠 게 아니면 당기지 마

translation.en: I wanted to shoot something. Right.
Will, if you get a lot of time,
are you really gonna give it away?
I've only ever had a day.
translation.ko: 난 하루 이상 가져본 적 없어

translation.en: How can you live with yourself watching people die right next to you?
translation.ko: 옆에 있는 사람이 죽는 걸 어떻게 봐?

translation.en: I can help you get all the time you want.
I need to borrow a month. What's the interest?
We can always come to some arrangement.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am happy to announce that Weis Timelenders
translation.ko: 여러분, 와이스 금융이 - 시간을 공짜로 나눠드려요 - 완전 무료죠

translation.en: is now offering interest-free loans with no payments. Ever.
So help yourselves and take a day.
Take a month. Hell, take a year.
Come on. Help yourselves! Take it. Take the time. It's free.
No one's watching their clocks, huh?
Get out of here, or I'll confiscate every second!
Must've thought it was a drive-through.
Don't move. I don't have much. Everything I have, I give away.
translation.ko: - 움직이지 마요 - 난 가진 시간이 없소

translation.en: Yes, sir, I do know that, sir.
There are years that shouldn't be there.
Doesn't he understand he's hurting the very people he's trying to help?
I finally had time to buy one of these.
Let's not do anything I might regret.
FEMALE ANCHOR: Today, Sylvia Weis withdrew some of her "inheritance"
when she and Will Salas robbed her father's time bank
for the sixth time in a week.
Does she want to kill me?
Just not as good as that.
You haven't forgotten how to play cards.
Why did I play strip poker with you?
translation.ko: 옷 벗기 내기를 내가 왜 했을까?

translation.en: This is where the hours and the days are.
This is where I would hide.
So much for your theory. Shit!
I'm telling you, he'll give up before we do! You sure about that?
Hi. We're looking for a quiet place to stay.
We were hoping for something long-term.
Can we rely on the discretion of your staff?
Nobody goes anywhere! Wait, whoa, whoa.
You know who I'm looking for.
I'm looking for whoever gave this man a month!
translation.ko: 이 자식한테 한 달이나 거저 준 놈

translation.en: And I'm gonna clean the clocks off of every one of you in this hellhole
until someone says something I want to hear.
translation.ko: 한 놈씩 차례대로 시계를 싹 비워주지

translation.en: Please don't. Please. I don't know where they are!
I just want a share of the reward.
there's no way they won't kill us, is there?
And every day since I met you.
You forget, I almost got you killed a few times, too.
How's the poor little rich girl?
I never got a chance to
properly thank you for your time.
There are a lot more ways to die around here.
But here, there's dancing before dying.
Of course, it's your friend I'm most happy to run into again.
translation.ko: 무엇보다 네 친구를 다시 만나서 기쁘군

translation.en: You've been causing a lot of trouble, which is normally my job.
translation.ko: 사고 많이 쳤더군 그건 내 주특긴데

translation.en: The reason the Timekeepers leave me alone is 'cause I have boundaries.
I steal from my own people.
You surely know things are bad when I have to restore order.
Fortunately for you, I don't like to kill a man in cold blood.
I think you deserve a fighting chance.
I lose, I die. I win, they kill me.
translation.ko: 져도 죽고 이겨도 이들이 죽일 텐데

translation.en: If you don't fight, I'll kill you now.
Then I'll collect my reward for making everything right in the world.
Don't you mean the time he's given away, sir?
I have given 50 years of my life to this job.
translation.ko: 시간을 통제하는 데 내 삶의 50년을 바쳤어

translation.en: I am not about to see those years go to waste.
translation.ko: 그 세월을 헛되게 할 순 없지

translation.en: I'm sorry to be the one to break this to you,
you won't have time to stand around.
We lost. We're not doing any good.
No. You don't understand. All they have to do is keep raising the cost of living.
A hundred years. Two. A thousand. It does nothing.
translation.ko: 백 년, 천 년이 있어도 아무 소용 없어

translation.en: So, what? We just stop fighting?
We can't win. We can't hurt them. The time we're taking makes no damn difference!
translation.ko: 지금처럼 해선 놈들한테 타격을 못 줘

translation.en: What would? What would hurt them?
A million years. You got a million years on you?
I guess it really would take a million years.
You've hired more guards since I last saw you.
Thanks to you, I need them.
You'd steal from your own father.
Is it stealing if it's already stolen?
You've started to regret that day, I imagine, Father.
It cost us centuries just to bribe our way in here.
translation.ko: 여기까지 오는 데 뇌물을 수백 년 썼는데

translation.en: Let's see what it got us.
There really is a man with a million years.
That's my first million. It won't be my last.
You know how much good it could do? I know how much harm it could do.
Try to understand, even if you gave a year to a million people, you're just prolonging their agony.
translation.ko: 백만 년을 나눠줘 봐야 고통만 늘어나

translation.en: Flooding the wrong Zone with a million years, it could cripple the system.
We're not meant to live like this.
We're not meant to live forever.
Although I do wonder, Father, if you've ever lived a day in your life.
Is that so? You might upset the balance for a generation.
translation.ko: 이런 식으로 다음 세대 삶의 균형을

translation.en: But don't fool yourself. In the end, nothing will change.
Because everyone wants to live forever.
They all think they have a chance at immortality even though all the evidence is against it.
They all think they will be the exception.
for a few to be immortal, many must die.
if even one person has to die.
What was that? What just happened?
It must be a mistake. A million years just went off the clock in New Greenwich.
translation.ko: 오류가 난 것 같습니다 뉴 그리니치에서 백만 년이 사라졌어요

translation.en: It's gotta be a mistake, sir. It's not a mistake.
DISPATCHER: There's a lot of traffic in the vicinity, sir.
All right, look for the slowest car.
You have a million years. You are definitely not in a hurry.
translation.ko: 백만 년을 가졌으니 서두를 필요 없겠지

translation.en: If this works, we gotta get more.
Dayton's not the only zone that can use a few extra years.
And wire me my per diem.
Give the order, shoot on sight.
In New Greenwich? That's against policy, sir.
So is having a million years leave the Zone.
That time cannot leave the Zone! Shoot on sight!
COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one month. Please deposit one month.
Keep going! Keep going! We're close!
Lost a lot of time, Mr. Leon.
Looks like you're about out yourself.
We can make it. Can we?
I worked out how to escape.
And now you make sure no one else does.
That's the way it has to be.
I'm gonna need some of that time you borrowed from me.
Unless you want us to die on the way to our execution.
translation.ko: 사형장 가기 전에 죽길 바라면 모를까

translation.en: One of us can make it. Take mine.
translation.ko: 둘은 못 가 내 시간 가져가

translation.en: You take mine. You can get there, I can't! I can't get there. You can.
What? The Keeper's time. Run. Run!
I need time. COMPUTER VOICE: Time transfer. (BEEPS)
Could do a lot in a day.
translation.ko: 하루면 많은 걸 할 수 있지

translation.en: FEMALE ANCHOR: These are live pictures from Dayton. Citizens have taken to the streets.
There's so much stolen time in circulation.
And now, citizens are crossing Zones, seen here entering New Greenwich.
While authorities claim they have the situation
under control, others fear the system may be headed for collapse.
translation.ko: 당국은 부인하고 있지만 시스템 붕괴가 우려되는 상황입니다

translation.en: We will continue to update you on this developing story.
Sir, we lost Zone Eight. And Ten.
MALE ANCHOR: Still no sign of fugitives Will Salas and Sylvia Weis.
translation.ko: 윌과 실비아의 행방은 아직 묘연한 상태인데

translation.en: Authorities continue to ask for the public's help in bringing these criminals to justice.
translation.ko: 당국은 그들을 체포하기 위해 시민의 제보를 받고 있습니다

translation.en: Told you there were bigger banks.
translation.ko: 더 큰 은행이 있을 거라 했잖아
